Row.Text: This pack is my ongoing attempt to fix everything I dislike about the vanilla Civilization VII experience. Feel free to request features, and I'll do my best to implement them. For more information check out the mod's GitHub page: https://github.com/craimasjien/civ7-craimasjiens-mod-pack

Compatible with [B]Sukritact's Simple UI Adjustments[/B], [B]TCS Improved Mod Page[/B] and [B]TCS Improved Plot Tooltip[/B]. I have not had any reports of incompatibilities. Please let me know on the Mod's GitHub page!
